text: Eduard Heger (born 3 May 1976 in Bratislava) is a Slovak politician. , he serves as Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance in Igor Matovič's Cabinet for Ordinary People. Between 2016 and 2020 he was a representative in the National Council. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Finance ministers of Slovakia Category:Members of the National Council (Slovakia) Category:OĽaNO politicians
title: Eduard Heger
